item.title: By: Tom Raftery
item.dc:creator: Tom Raftery
item.description: Oh, and I am co-chair (one of the organisers) of BlogTalk 2008!
item.content:encoded: Oh, and I am co-chair (one of the organisers) of BlogTalk 2008!

item.title: By: Tom Raftery
item.dc:creator: Tom Raftery
item.description: I know I hardly rank up there with Anthony Williams et al but thought I'd mention that I am speaking at both the Irish Web Technology conference and the ISA conference!
item.content:encoded: I know I hardly rank up there with Anthony Williams et al but thought I’d mention that I am speaking at both the Irish Web Technology conference and the ISA conference!
